Text:
Woo! My first comment, lol.

The Spoken language is actually Hindu (I'm guessing), against what it says above in the details.

I won't put it down though. Good video and great audio for those who want to listen to it in Hindu. Also has English Subs.
please upload the twilight saga breaking dawn in hindi eng dual audio

@jw2bmamylee it IS dual audio, just as the title suggests, both Hindi and English. The Hindi is played by default but it's easy enough to just switch to the English audio track (vlc: Audio->Audio Track->"English").

Have to say I'm a bit disappointed by the video quality though, I expected more from this kind of encode, this one is comparable to a 6-700MB rip.
